resource.chars:
Prof Allmans’ Memoir “on 
The Anatomy & Physiology 
of Condylophora - - “ appears to 
me to be characterized by 
very careful & accurate observation 
combined with a thorough knowledge 
of the general bearings of this 
subject upon philosophical 
zoology - and of the literature 
relating to it -
I can have no hesitation

Prof Allmans’ Memoir “on 
The Anatomy & Physiology 
of Cordylophora - - “ appears to 
me to be characterized by 
very careful & accurate observation 
combined with a thorough knowledge 
of the general bearings of this 
subject upon philosophical 
zoology - and of the literature 
relating to it -
I can have no hesitation
